pages.text: $(li)The Coral Reefs are structures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/warm_ocean)Warm Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/charm/coral_squid)Coral Squids$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/mimic_octopus)Mimic Octopus$(/l) can be found in this place.
